div.h4: How to get your access token.
div.p: This FHIR server is secured with OAuth2.0 based on SMART on FHIR. To make requests on the server, the developer will need a token. This means that he must be able to retrieve an access token. In order to retrieve an access token, the developer must first be registered on the authorization server.
To register, a request must be made in advance to Mr. Axel Teichmann at the following address: it.team@abrumet.be
